map.string: Enable debug output to more precisely identify sources of import errors. Warning: the output can slow down import on many machines.
Limits amount of importer generated models for dae files
Enable preprocessing for DAE files to fix some ColladaDOM related problems (like support for space characters within names and ids).
Enable(disable) timestamp showing in the chat.
Enable(disable) showing of a names in the chat.
A URL pointing to a crash report handler; overrides cluster negotiation to locate crash handler.
Time before automatically setting AFK (away from keyboard) mode (seconds, 0=never). Valid values are: 0, 120, 300, 600, 1800
Ack messages collection and grouping time
Enable the debug admin menu from the main menu. Note: This will just allow the menu to be shown; this does not grant admin privileges.
Transparency of active floaters (floaters that have focus)
Display advanced parameter settings in snaphot interface
Display advanced parameter settings in outfit snaphot interface
Ask the simulator to stop updating the agent while enabled
Set if there's unsupported hardware and we've already done a notification.
Tapping a direction key twice and holding it down makes avatar run
Request performance analysis for a particular viewer run
Show active animations in a bubble above avatars head
When entering appearance editing mode, camera zooms in on currently selected portion of avatar
Preview selections in color picker immediately
Preview selections in texture picker or material picker immediately
While cursor is in chat entry box, arrow keys still control your avatar
Turns off dialog asking if you want to enable crash reporting
When auctioning land, include parcel boundary marker in snapshot
Scale of doppler effect on moving audio sources (1.0 = normal, <1.0 = diminished doppler effect, >1.0 = enhanced doppler effect)
Master audio level, or overall volume
Controls the distance-based dropoff of audio volume (fraction or multiple of default audio rolloff)
Controls the distance-based dropoff of audio volume underwater(fraction or multiple of default audio rolloff)
Audio level of in-world sound effects
Audio level of UI sound effects
Audio level of wind noise when standing still
Replaces keywords with a configured word or phrase
Automatically load ALL profile webpages without asking first.
Login automatically using last username/password combination
Enable viewer mime type discovery of media URLs
Keep camera position locked when avatar walks to selected position
Update snapshot when camera stops moving, or any parameter changes
Disable tone mapping and exposure correction when snapshot is being rendered
Fly by holding jump key or using "Fly" command (FALSE = fly by using "Fly" command only)
Add rim lighting to avatar rendering to approximate shininess of skin
Specifies sort key for textures in avatar picker (+0 = name, +1 = date, +2 = folders always by name, +4 = system folders to top)
Angle between avatar facing and camera facing at which avatar turns to face same direction as camera, when moving slowly (degrees)
Angle between avatar facing and camera facing at which avatar turns to face same direction as camera, when moving fast (degrees)
Specifes the maximum time in seconds to wait before sending your baked textures for avatar appearance. Set to 0 to disable and wait until all baked textures are at highest resolution.
Specifes the maximum time in seconds to wait before updating your appearance during appearance mode.
Amount of time to yield every frame to other applications when SL is not the foreground window (milliseconds)
FOR TESTING ONLY: Tell the built-in web browser to ignore SSL cert errors.
(WARNING: Advanced feature. Use if you are aware of the implications). Enable or disable the viewer to Javascript bridge object.
Drop around 50% of VisualParam occurances in appearance messages (for simulating Ruth)
Proxy type to use for HTTP operations

Bulk permission changes affect environment settings
Bulk changed objects can be copied by everyone
Bulk changed objects can be copied by next owner
Bulk changed objects can be modified by next owner
Bulk changed objects can be resold or given away by next owner
Bulk changed objects are shared with the currently active group

When set, display additional cache debugging information
The percent of total cache size (defined by CacheSize) to use for the disk cache
The name of the disk cache (within the standard Viewer disk cache directory)

Controls the top folder location of the the local disk cache
Controls number of regions to be cached for objects.
Controls amount of hard drive space reserved for local file caching in MB

How many seconds it takes the camera to transition between focal distances

Whenever keyboard focus is removed from the UI, and the chat bar is visible, the chat bar takes focus

Show chat history window separately from Communicate window.
Max number of active members we'll show up for an unresponsive group

If true, viewer will attempt to pipeline HTTP requests.

Number of local lights to render.
Near clip plane split distances for shadow map frusta (x=perspective, y=ortho, z=transition rate).
Amount to scale distance to virtual origin of shadow perspective projection.
Cutoff slope value for points to affect perspective shadow generation
Exponent applied to transition between ortho and perspective shadow projections based on viewing angle and light vector.
Amount of shadow map splits to render (0 - 3).
Scaling factor for the area to sample for occluders (pixels at 1 meter away, inversely varying with distance)
Scaling factor for irradiance input to SSAO
Max factor for irradiance input to SSAO
Occlusion sensitivity factor for ambient occlusion (larger is more)
Multiplier for (1) value and (2) saturation (HSV definition), for areas which are totally occluded. Blends with original color for partly-occluded areas. (Third component is unused.)
Renders screen space reflections to better account for dynamic objects with reflection probes.
Number of times the ray march algorithm runs to find a potential hit.
How big the step is between each run.
Distance bias to apply when rejecting a potential sample.
Bias against the depth buffer before rejecting a sample.
Maximum number of samples to apply for glossy SSR.
Maximum distance at which to render bumpmapped primitives (distance in meters, squared)
Scaler applied to height map when generating normal maps
Whether we can render the cube map or not
Enable strict GL debugging on the start of next session.
Scale of normals in debug display.
Disable tone mapping and exposure correction when build floater is open (for artists developing materials)
Enable HDR for post processing buffer
Maximum OpenGL version to attempt use (minimum 3.2 maximum 4.6). Requires restart.
Maximum amount of texture memory to budget for (in MB), or 0 for autodetect.
Maximum texture index to use for indexed texture rendering.
Bake sunlight into vertex buffers for static objects.
Disable rendering of alpha objects (render all alpha objects as alpha masks).
Triangle count threshold at which automatic LOD generation stops
Cutoff for depth difference that amounts to an edge.
Cutoff for normal difference that amounts to an edge.
Scalar for softening alpha surfaces (for soft particles).
Noise scalar to hide banding in deferred render.
Bias value for spot shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Offset value for spot shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Bias value for shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Offset value for shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Error scale for shadow bias (based on altitude).
Error scale for shadow offset (based on altitude).
EXPERIMENTAL: Prime the depth buffer with simple prim geometry before rendering with textures.
Whether to use depth of field effect when Advanced Lighting Model is enabled
Whether to use depth of field effect when in edit mode
Amount to scale down depth of field resolution. Valid range is 0.25 (quarter res) to 1.0 (full res)
Whether to support projectors as spotlights when Advanced Lighting Model is disabled
Bias value for shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Offset value for shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Scale of shadow map resolution vs. screen resolution (only positivie values are allowed)
Bias value for tree shadows (prevent shadow acne).
Offset value for tree shadows (prevent shadow acne).
DEPRECATED --- Show glow effect when hovering on interactive objects.
Specular exponent for generating spec map
DEPRECATED (only true supported) - Use deferred rendering pipeline (Advanced Lighting Model).
Execute sunlight shader in deferred renderer.
Execute atmospheric shader in deferred renderer.
Execute screen space ambient occlusion shader in deferred renderer.
Execute shadow softening shader in deferred renderer.
Amount local lights are washed out by sun.
Magnitude of noise on shadow samples.
Cutoff error value to use ortho instead of perspective projection.
Cutoff FOV to use ortho instead of perspective projection.
Gaussian coefficients for the two shadow/SSAO blurring passes (z component unused).
Number of samples to take for each pass of shadow blur (value range 1-16). Actual number of samples is value * 2 - 1.
Number of samples to use for FSAA (0 = no AA).
Distance of far clip plane from camera (meters)
Use alpha masks where appropriate when not using the Advanced Lighting Model
Use alpha masks where appropriate in the Advanced Lighting Model
Controls level of detail of flexible objects (multiplier for amount of time spent processing flex objects)
DEPRECATED - Distance from camera where fog reaches maximum density (fraction or multiple of far clip distance)
DEPRECATED - Sets gamma exponent for renderer
Use fully controllable gamma correction, instead of faster, hard-coded gamma correction of 2.
Gamma ramp exponent for final correction before display gamma.
Don't use a compatibility profile OpenGL context. Requires restart.
Allow OpenGL to use multiple render contexts for loading textures (may reduce frame stutters, doesn't play nice with Intel drivers).
Allow OpenGL to use multiple render contexts for playing media (may reduce frame stutters, doesn't play nice with Intel drivers)
Number of times to iterate the glow (higher = wider and smoother but slower)
Weights for each color channel to be used in calculating luminance (should add up to 1.0)
Max glow alpha value for brightness extraction to auto-glow.
Min luminance intensity necessary to consider an object bright enough to automatically glow.
Glow map resolution power of two.
Amount of warmth extraction to use (versus luminance extraction). 0 = lum, 1.0 = warmth
Weight of each color channel used before finding the max warmth
Glow sample size (higher = wider and softer but eventually more pixelated)
Enables glow noise (dithering). Reduces banding from glow in certain cases.

Show selection lines on objects that are behind other objects

Show group titles in name labels
Show display names in name labels

Render influence volumes of Reflection Probes

Maximum size of a vertex buffer (in KB).

DEPRECATED -- use RenderTransparentWater and RenderReflectionProbeDetail -- Detail of reflection render pass.
Detail of reflections. (-1 - Disabled, 0 - Static Only, 1 - Static + Dynamic, 2 - Realtime)

Resolution of reflection probe radiance maps (requires restart). Will be set to the next highest power of two clamped to [64, 512]. Note that changing this value may consume a massive amount of video memory.
Exposure value to send to tonemapper.
Camera far clip to use when updating reflection probes.
Amount reflection probes contribute to ambient light.
When RenderReflectionProbeLevel is 0, amount of time in seconds to wait between updates to reflection map.
Reflection probes control. 0 - disable (one probe to rule them all), 1 - manual probes only, 2 - manual + terrain/water, 3 - Manual + Terrain/water + objects.
Divisor for rendering 3D scene at reduced resolution.
Max lighting level to use in the shader (class 3 is default, 2 is less lights, 1 is sun/moon only. Works around shader compiler bugs on certain platforms.)

If true, automatically adjust legacy skies (those without a probe ambiance value) to take advantage of probes and HDR. This is the "opt-out" button for HDR and tonemapping when coupled with a sky setting that predates PBR.

in pixels, all objects in view frustum whose screen area is greater than this threshold will be loaded
in MB, when total memory usage above this threshold, minimum invisible objects are kept in memory
in MB, when total memory usage above this threshold, start to reduce invisible objects kept in memory
in meters, all objects (visible or invisible) within this radius will remain loaded in memory
a percentage of draw distance beyond which all objects outside of view frustum will be unloaded, regardless of pixel threshold
in pixels, all objects out of view frustum whose screen area is greater than this threshold will remain loaded

Color of the pathfinding test-pathing tool end-point when the path is invalid.
Color of the pathfinding test-path when the path is valid.
Ambiance of lit pathfinding navmesh displays.
Amount to darken/lighten x-ray lines in pathfinding display.
Opacity of xray lines in pathfinding display.
Render pathfinding navmesh xray as a wireframe.
Width of volume outlines in pathfinding navmesh display.
Depth offset of volume outlines in pathfinding display.
Color of water plane when displaying pathfinding navmesh.
Hide all menu items and buttons
[DEBUG] Make allocateScreenBuffer return false. Used to test error handling.
Time to wait before displaying world during teleport (seconds)
Delay to prevent teleports after starting an in-sim teleport. (seconds)
Enable profiler tool if using FMOD Ex or FMOD Studio
Sets the streaming decode buffer size (in milliseconds) for FMOD Ex or FMOD Studio
Sets the streaming buffer size (in milliseconds) for FMOD Ex or FMOD Studio
Disables the artificial delay in the viewer that precaches some incoming assets
Version information generated by running the viewer
Limits number of items in the folder that can be replaced/added to current outfit
(obsolete) Everyone can copy the newly created objects
(obsolete) Newly created objects can be copied by next owner
(obsolete) Newly created objects can be modified by next owner
(obsolete) Newly created objects can be resold or given away by next owner
(obsolete) Newly created objects are shared with the currently active group
Controls RenderAvatarMaxComplexity in a non-linear fashion (do not set this value)
Controls RenderAvatarMaxNonImpostors in a non-linear fashion (do not set this value)
if true, disables running the GPU benchmark at startup (default to class 1)
Allow the viewer to adjust your settings to achieve target FPS
When enabled the viewer will dynamically change settings until auto tune is explicitly turned off.
When enabled the AutoTuneLock will be maintainted all following sessions.
Allow own render time to impostor your avatar.
Show the current render time not the pre-tuning render time in the avatar display.
Render Time Limit in microseconds (0.0 = no limit)
The lowest draw distance that auto tune is allowed to use
The draw distance that auto tune will try to achieve
Enable/disable render time data to support autotune.
Enable/disable using MaxNonImpostor to limit avatar rendering by distance.
Avatars beyond this range will automatically be optimized
Strategy to use when tuning FPS. 0=Tune avatar rendering only, 1=Tune both avatar and global scene settings, 2=Tune only global scene.
Opacity of the Camera Controls floater
Preset camera position - view (0 - rear, 1 - front, 2 - group, 3 - custom)
Camera view is affected by Hover Height setting
Quality value to use in the JPEG encoder (0..100)
Flag if set, saves off each cube map as an image, as well as the JavaScript data URL, for debugging purposes
Width of the output 360 equirectangular image
Flag if set, removes all the avatars from the 360 snapshot
Field of view of the WebGL camera that converts the cubemap to an equirectangular image
Number of times to render the scene while taking a snapshot
Resets the UI scale factor on first run due to changed display scaling behavior
Updates the application window title bar with brief information about user/location
Override MFA state hash for authentication
For debugging -- number of cores to restrict the main process to, or 0 for no limit. Requires restart.
Show non-default settings only in Debug Settings list
Sets the action for 'Find original' and 'Show in Inventory' (0 - shows item in main Inventory, 1 - opens a new single-folder window)
Maximum seconds for viewer stats file data, prevents huge file
Interval to save viewer stats file data
In viewer stats data file, skip saving entry if there is no data
Sets the action for Double-click on folder in multi-folder view (0 - expands and collapses folder, 1 - opens a new window, 2 – stays in current floater but switches to SFV)
Sets the action for Double-click on folder in single-folder view (0 - stays in current window, 1 - opens a new window)
